snippet: The lawyer for the captured American fugitive George Wright filed arguments on Thursday, telling a Lisbon court that Mr. Wright should be allowed to serve the rest of his sentence in Portugal.
lead_paragraph: The lawyer for the captured American fugitive George Wright filed arguments on Thursday, telling a Lisbon court that Mr. Wright should be allowed to serve the rest of his sentence in Portugal.

headline.main: Portugal: Ex-Fugitive Challenges Extradition to United States
headline.print_headline: Portugal: Ex-Fugitive Challenges Extradition to United States
